nodes.text: The Var-Shaa dockyard was a dockyard that was stationed at the Mid Rim planet of Var-Shaa during the Galactic Civil War and was a pivotal waypoint of the Imperial Navy of the Galactic Empire. Following the Battle of Jeyell, the ISD Overseer defended the dockyard during a strike on the facility. The Overseer was heavily damaged and forced to retreat, but returned to search for survivors. The Overseer was then refitted and fully overhauled.
